name.en: Winged Dragon, Guardian of the Fortress #1
name.fr: Dragon Ailé, Gardien de la Forteresse N° 1
name.ja: <ruby>砦<rt>とりで</rt></ruby>を<ruby>守<rt>まも</rt></ruby>る<ruby>翼<rt>よく</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby>

text.en: A dragon commonly found guarding mountain fortresses. Its signature attack is a sweeping dive from out of the blue.
text.fr: Dragon que l'on trouve généralement gardant les forteresses de montagne. On le reconnaît à son attaque sous forme de plongeon profond venu de nulle part.
text.ja: 山の砦を守る竜。天空から急降下して敵を攻撃。
text.ko: 산의 요새를 지키는 용. 천공에서 급강하하여 적을 공격.

ja.set_name: Strongest Battle Deck Yuamu - Come Forth! High Tech Dragon!

ko.set_name: Strongest Battle Deck Yuamu - Come Forth! High Tech Dragon!
